title: Industry and Tragedy of the Commons

content.question: Which of the following is an example of an industrial practice that contributes to the tragedy of the commons?

choices.label: Burning fossil fuels for energy production
Creating constructed wetlands on abandoned land
Enacting and enforcing legislation on point-source pollutants

content.answer: Burning fossil fuels for energy production

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
